participant_1.background:
I'm a power plant operator.
i m a really , really good guitar player.
I am a teacher who is engaged to a man that my family does not approve of
I'm a touring musician, but I also like gardening.
i got off the road when i married my sweetheart.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud to have a happy and healthy relationship with my partner.
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
I prefer to walk to places, whether I'm going for a walk with my dog or running errands.
i can play piano.
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Hey! It's been a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army, but other than that it's been going well!
Oh I'm sorry to hear that. I'm glad to hear your day is going well otherwise though!
Thanks! What about you, how is your day going?
My day is going great! I'm a teacher and I just got back from my first day of school.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I'm sure it was a lot of fun.
It was! I got to meet my new students and I'm excited to start teaching them.
That's great! I'm sure you're going to be a great teacher.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to play guitar, garden, and spend time with my partner.
Oh that sounds fun! I like to play piano, walk my dog, and dye my hair blue.
Oh cool! I used to play piano when I was younger.
Yeah it's a lot of fun!
What do you like about it?
I like the way it makes me feel and I like being able to play songs that I like.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy it.
